attributes.action: call for international action on war crimes in Somalia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amnsety International reports of violent attacks on young teenagers and incidents of gang rape - 6,000 people by soldiers of all people ! As agents of the state, the petitioner is calling on the PM. to use diplomatic pressures to ensure Somalian govt authorities are properly supervising their staff and investigating, trying, prosecuting and imprisoning perpetrators as a deterrent, in the same way as any other crime against humanity.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
